seprhou.gui

Class AtcGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • seprhou.gui.AtcGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationListener

    public class AtcGame
extends Game
    The main class of the game

    This class is used for all incoming events (like Game.render() from libGDX. After the game is setup, all the events received by this class are simply passed to the current screen.
